Package model.player

Class Player

java.lang.Object
observer.Observable
model.player.Player
public class Player extends Observable
This class represents a player.

      public Player(String username, String json)
      Constructor of the Player class
      Parameters:
      username - is the username of the player, given to the server by the player.
      json - is the string containing the parameters of the personal objective, given to the player by the server

    • addToObjectsInHand

      public void addToObjectsInHand(ObjectCard objectCard) throws TooManyObjectsInHandException
      Insert an objectCard in the player's hand
      Parameters:
      objectCard - is the card that has to be added to the hand
      Throws:
      TooManyObjectsInHandException - if the hand is already full

    • getObjectInHand

      public ObjectCard getObjectInHand(int positionInDeck) throws EmptyDeckException
      Returns the object in the specified position of the player's hand
      Parameters:
      positionInDeck - is the position of the card in the player's turn deck.
      Returns:
      the object in the specified position.
      Throws:
      EmptyDeckException - if the hand deck does not contain any card.

    • getObjectsInHandSize

      public int getObjectsInHandSize()
      Return the number of objects in the player's hand
      Returns:
      the number of object cards this player currently has in hand.
